summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue from East Fifty-second Street to a point two hundred fifty (250) feet north of north margin of East 5th Street in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers under Ordinance No. 14960, creating Local Improvement District No. 1314 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
